briefTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety of Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Children, Adolescents and Adults in Russia
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multi-center, Open-label Study to Evaluate Immunogenicity and Safety of Novartis Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine (MenACWY-CRM) in Healthy Children, Adolescents and Adults in Russia
summary: To evaluate the immune response and safety following a single dose of Novartis Meningococcal ACWY conjugate vaccine (MenACWY-CRM) in healthy children, adolescents and adults in Russia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentages of Overall Subjects With Seroresponse After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination
